description:
Marris`s Karrablast participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the fifth match and faced off against Ash`s Leavanny. The match quickly showcased Ash`s Leavanny finishing off Marris`s Karrablast with Energy Ball to win the battle which allowed Ash to advance to the second round while Marris was eliminated from the tournament.
None of Marris`s Karrablast moves are known.
name: Kaburumo (Morishima)
